CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 2007 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 2007 Code, as through July 17, 2018, which are included herein. Sections of the 2007 Code, as not listed herein, have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
2007 Code
Section Section
this Code
